mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, firstName, lastName, email, password, phone) VALUES (#{username}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = CASE WHEN #{username} IS NOT NULL THEN #{username} ELSE username END, email = CASE WHEN #{email} IS NOT NULL THEN #{email} ELSE email END, phone = CASE WHEN #{phone} IS NOT NULL THEN #{phone} ELSE phone END, userStatus = CASE WHEN #{userStatus} IS NOT NULL THEN #{userStatus} ELSE userStatus END WHERE username = #{username}
